JapaneseDic.English: am / is / are called, my name is
Excuse me / pardon me, I'm sorry
Here you are / here you go
Nice to meet you, treat me kindly
Please - I wish/I beg of you

JapaneseDic.Kata: どうぞよろしくおねがいします

JapaneseDic.English: Please, please give me, can I get, may I
Take care, have a good day, have fun

JapaneseDic.Kata: ありがとうございました
ありがとうございます
